author: JENNIFER SINCO KELLEHER / AP
title: Hawaii Mayor Calls Traveler Arrested for Flouting Quarantine Rules a ‘Covidiot’
description: A Florida man was arrested last week after police say he landed on the island without proof of accommodations
content:
(HONOLULU) — A mayor in Hawaii has a choice word for the Florida man accused of trying to flout Hawaii’s traveler quarantine: “covidiot.”
Kauai Mayor Derek Kawakami isn’t taking credit for coining the word borne out of the COVID-19 pandemic, but said, “I may… [+3540 chars]
